p: The quality of the sequences was analyzed using Sequencing Analysis 5.2 software (Applied Biosystems). The consensus sequence was edited using Accelrys Gene v.2.5 (Accelrys). Nucleotide sequences were then aligned with the previously published E gene sequence from GenBank (GU131863.1) using MEGA 6.0.6 Molecular Evolutionary Genetics Analysis ( http://en.bio-soft.net/tree/MEGA.html).
